publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3723 Bruce Crawford on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Committee Remit—That the Parliament agrees that the remit of the Education, Lifelong Learning and Culture Committee be amended to— To consider and report on (a) further and higher education, lifelong learning, schools, pre-school care, skills and other matters falling within the responsibility of the Cabinet Secretary for Education and Lifelong Learning; and (b) matters relating to culture and the arts falling within the responsibility of the Minister for Culture, External Affairs and the Constitution.
